recipesJson.name: Satisfaction
recipesJson.author: Kelgar78
recipesJson.description: A banana ice cream. Steep it for 2-3 days and its ready! Enjoy!

reviews.text: So after 1 day of steep i have to say that is an accurate approach of banana ice cream. The stone of banana its very good and after 1 day( cause i couldnt w8 longer) you have the creams and milky tastes of the concentrates that gives you as a result the ice cream taste. Ofc creams dont cover the banana and i think i will give it a try again in a 100ml bottle this time so i can see if something changes. I think it is what the name says and i really loved it. If you try it you gonna like it too, i am sure!
